agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Pensions, Investments & Financial Services TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Thursday, March 21, 2019 PLACE: E2.026 CHAIR: Rep. Jim Murphy The committee will meet to consider the following: HB 1175 Lambert Relating to investments by state banks to promote community development. HB 1535 Flynn Relating to the continuation and functions of the State Securities Board. HB 1569 Lambert Relating to the continuation and functions of the Finance Commission of Texas, the Texas Department of Banking, and the Department of Savings and Mortgage Lending and to the regulation of certain financial institutions and businesses. HB 1612 Murphy Relating to the authority of the Teacher Retirement System of Texas to invest in certain hedge funds. HB 1716 Flynn Relating to certain public facilities financed, owned, and operated by a public facility corporation. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
